commands.command.temp-role.description:
Adds roles to a certain participant for a while or forever
You can summarize the roles
The time is indicated in the format `1d1h1m1s` the values can be combined and also duplicated, for example `1d2h1d`
commands.command.temp-role.brief: Adds roles to a certain participant for a while or forever
commands.command.temp-role.examples.0.de: Issues the role of role for 12 hours to the participant lordcode.
